content.text:
# Draft:Battle of Goggasthana

The Battle of Goggasthana was fought between the Chaulukyas of Gujarat commanded by General Kumara and the Paramaras of Malwa under king Vindhyavarman. It was a victory for the Chaulukyas, and temporarily halted Vindhyavarman's campaigns to restore Paramara power.
